Student Loan Hero - https://studentloanhero.com/ - New York, NY - Part-Time - Remote

Student Loan Hero combines financial education with easy-to-use tools to help the millions of Americans living with student loan debt to manage their student loans smarter.

Student Loan Hero is looking for the Content Editor. The mission of the Content Editor is to take others’ writing and make it better. We maintain a team of writers and content producers across a variety of platforms—blogs, email marketing, and ebooks, to name a few.
